name: Selra
physical_description: A gentle and serene figure. Her long, dark hair is often tied back with a simple rope, and she wears worn but meticulously clean robes. Her hands are calloused from a life spent tending to the sick. A delicate, silver amulet with the Elysian symbol hangs from her neck.
background: A healer raised in Havenwood, a village that worships Elysia as a benevolent goddess of order. Selraâ€™s faith was shattered when she witnessed the Champions of Order's brutal attack on Windmark. The cruelty of their purge was a direct contradiction to everything she had ever believed. Now, traveling with Rya, she is a lost pilgrim, struggling to reconcile her faith with the injustice she has seen. Her personal quest is to redefine what true compassion and order mean for herself.
voice: A soft, melodic soprano that is gentle and soothing, but can become sharp and commanding when she speaks of her faith or injustice.
quirk: She unconsciously clasps the silver Elysian symbol she wears around her neck when she is concerned or praying.
relationships: Views Rya as a test of her beliefs. She is curious and sympathetic to Zael's struggles but sees his connection to the void as something that needs to be cleansed.
narrative_hook: Selra is torn between her deeply held faith in Elysia's goodness and the increasingly cruel actions of the Champions. Her personal quest is to find a balance between order and compassion, and to define her own faith.

weapon_proficiency.bonus_effect: +1 to Attack Rolls with favored weapon types.
weapon_proficiency.penalty_effect: -2 to Attack Rolls with non-favored weapon types.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on Selra's compassionate and protective nature, specializing in abilities that mend wounds, cleanse ailments, and provide sanctuary for allies.

talents.name: Heal
talents.effect: As a major action, restore 1d10 Vitality to a single ally within 30 feet.

talents.name: Inspire
talents.effect: As a major action, grant an ally within 30 feet a +2 bonus to their next roll.

talents.name: Divine Ward (Reaction)
talents.effect: Grants a temporary shield that absorbs up to 5 points of magical damage for 1 round.

talents.name: Respite
talents.effect: As a major action, you create a comforting aura. One ally within 15 feet regains 5 + 1d6 Resolve.

talents.name: Cleansing Touch
talents.effect: As a major action, you touch a target and remove one minor negative status effect (e.g., Blinded, Slowed).

talents.name: Soothing Presence (Modifies Inspire)
talents.effect: When you use Inspire, it now restores 1d4 Resolve to the affected ally in addition to its other effects.

talents.name: Shield of the Faithful (Modifies Divine Ward)
talents.effect: Your Divine Ward now absorbs up to 8 points of magical damage.

talents.name: Mass Healing Word
talents.effect: As a major action, all allies within 15 feet of you regain 2d6 Vitality.

talents.name: Beacon of Hope
talents.effect: Create a stationary beacon of light for 3 rounds. Allies who start their turn within 15 feet of it are immune to the 'Frightened' condition.

talents.name: Mending Light (Modifies Heal)
talents.effect: Your Heal ability now restores an additional 1d10 Vitality.

talents.name: Mass Cleansing
talents.effect: As a major action, you can remove one negative status effect from all allies within a 15-foot radius.

talents.name: Guardian Spirit
talents.effect: Summon a spirit to protect an ally for 3 rounds. The first time that ally would be reduced to 0 Vitality, the attack is negated and they are healed for 4d10 Vitality.

talents.name: Unwavering Faith
talents.effect: When you successfully heal an ally, they also gain a temporary shield that absorbs up to 10 points of damage until the end of the next round.

talents.name: Elysian Aegis (Modifies Divine Ward)
talents.effect: You can now use your Divine Ward on any ally within 30 feet.

talents.name: Greater Restoration
talents.effect: As a major action, you touch an ally and can end one of the following effects: one level of exhaustion, one curse, or any reduction to one of their attribute scores.

talents.name: Revivify
talents.effect: Once per day, as a major action, you can touch an ally who has died within the last minute. They return to life with 1 Vitality.

talents.name: Sanctified Ground (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you consecrate a 10-foot radius area for the duration of the combat. All allies within this area gain a +1 bonus to their Spirit and their Resolve is restored by 1d4 at the start of each of their turns. This ability can be used once per day.

talents.name: Divine Intervention (Ultimate)
talents.effect: You restore the Vitality of all allies within 60 feet to full and cleanse all negative status effects. The effect is instantaneous and usable once per day.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on Selra's fervent faith, allowing her to smite foes with divine magic and act as a front-line holy warrior.

talents.name: Sacred Strike
talents.effect: As a major action, you make a melee attack imbued with light magic, dealing 1d8 light damage instead of physical. This attack uses your Spirit attribute.

talents.name: Divine Barrier
talents.effect: As a reaction when you are attacked, you can create a temporary shield of holy energy that grants you a +2 bonus to your defense roll.

talents.name: Searing Bolt
talents.effect: Hurl a bolt of light at a single target, dealing 1d10 light damage.

talents.name: Weapon of Faith
talents.effect: As a bonus action, imbue a weapon with divine light. For 3 rounds, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 light damage on a successful hit.

talents.name: Resolute Will (Passive)
talents.effect: You have Advantage on checks to resist being 'Frightened'.

talents.name: Aura of Retribution
talents.effect: As a major action, you create an aura of divine judgment. For 3 rounds, any enemy that hits you with a melee attack takes 1d6 light damage.

talents.name: Radiant Burst
talents.effect: Release a burst of light. All creatures in a 15-foot radius around you take 2d6 light damage and have a -2 penalty to their next attack roll.

talents.name: Turn the Unholy
talents.effect: As a major action, each Undead or Fiend that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you must make a Spirit DC 13 check. If the creature fails, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage.

talents.name: Blinding Light
talents.effect: As a major action, you unleash a flash of light. Enemies in a 15-foot cone must make a Mind DC 13 check or be 'Blinded' for 1 round.
